rules_text:
When Everything Is Going Great enters, create a 4/4 Elemental creature token that's all colors.
At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one other target nonland permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.
notes:
Everything Is Going Great — Tiny Stills
!script "<s><l>Spawn Elemental</l><f>/spawn Elemental AVX</f></s>","r"
